title: Ashley Benson shows off darker hair while stepping out in fitted black jeans
text:
She was first linked to model and actress Cara Delevingne in May 2018 after starring in the drama Her Smell.

And on Thursday, Ashley Benson was spotted stepping out solo in Los Angeles while rocking a darker hair color.

The 29-year-old Pretty Little Liars actress paired her darker 'do with a black shirt tucked into matching denim bottoms, adding boots and a crossbody handbag.

Looking good: Ashley Benson was spotted stepping out solo in Los Angeles while rocking a darker hair color on Thursday afternoon

Ashley chose skintight denim, highlighting her slim form; the TV star hit the pavement in black heeled boots.

The star tucked her black short sleeved top into her high-waisted bottoms, adding a silver and black handbag.

Ashley, who stepped out in the Century City neighborhood of Los Angeles, wore her brunette hair loose around in slight waves, opting for a center part.

The star, who normally rocks darker roots with blonde, showed off her new brunette color on her Instagram stories Wednesday.

Stunner: The 29-year-old Pretty Little Liars actress paired her darker 'do with a black shirt tucked into matching denim bottoms, adding boots and a crossbody handbag

Close up: The beauty is known for rocking blonde wavy tresses; seen here September 9 in NYC

She revealed the color change with a clip showing her looking at her hair in the mirror; she had Billie Eilish's Bad Guy playing in the video.

Ashley, who captioned it 'Dark side,' got her hair done by hair colorist Brittany King at Mare Salon in West Hollywood.

The star also posed for a snap after her darker hair was dried and then styled in loose waves.

Views: She revealed the color change with a clip showing her looking at her hair in the mirror; she had Billie Eilish's Bad Guy playing in the video

Change: Ashley, who captioned it 'Dark side,' got her hair done by colorist Brittany King at Mare Salon in West Hollywood

Fabulous: The star also posed for a snap after her darker hair was dried and then styled in loose waves; she tagged hair colorist Brittany King

Ashley is in a relationship with model Cara Delevingne, 27; the duo have been dating since May 2018 after they met on the film Her Smell.

They have been seen rocking matching bands on their ring fingers.

The duo were reported The Sun on Sunday in early August to have wed in Little Las Vegas chapel in an Elvis-themed ceremony after the chapels owner told the publication: 'They were sure about what they are doing and they were sure about what they mean to each other.'

Lovebirds: Ashley is in a relationship with model Cara Delevingne; the duo have been dating since May 2018 after they met on the film Her Smell; pictured on September 7, 2019 in NYC at the 2019 US Open Women's final

However, Cara and Ashley are not married, according to E! News.

The outlet reported that no marriage license for the two stars was found in the Las Vegas public records.

E! News did report that they had a friendship ceremony last year.

Close: They have been seen rocking matching bands on their ring fingers; pictured September 7, 2019
description: She was first linked to model and actress Cara Delevingne in May 2018 after starring in the drama Her Smell. And on Thursday, Ashley Benson was  out solo in LA while rocking a darker hair color.
